name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction.

name: Luster Dragon
description: A very beautiful dragon covered in sapphire. It does not like fights, but has incredibly high attack power.

name: Alexandrite Dragon
description: Many of the scales of this dragon are ancient alexandrite stones.

name: Hyozanryu
description: A dragon created from a massive diamond that sparkles with blinding light.

name: Hunter Dragon
description: A dragon that swallows its prey whole.

name: Uraby
description: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

name: Crawling Dragon
description: This weakened dragon has lost its ability to fly, but is still a deadly opponent.

name: Koumori Dragon
description: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon.

name: Petit Dragon
description: A very small dragon with a very vicious disposition.

name: Mystical Elf
description: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

name: Battle Ox
description: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

name: Pot of Greed
description: Draw 2 cards.

name: Mountain
description: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder-Type monsters by 200 points.

name: Raigeki
description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

name: Dark Hole
description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

name: Monster Reborn
description: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

name: Change of Heart
description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

name: Sword of Deep-Seated
description: A monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 500 points. When this card is sent to the Graveyard, it is returned to the top of the Deck.

name: Trap Hole
description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

name: Reinforcements
description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.
